requestParams.name: business_hours_advanced
requestParams.desc: 营业时间,按天设置。示例[{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"16:00","weekdays":["周一","周二","周三","周四","周五"]},{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"20:00","weekdays":["周六","周日"]}]

requestParams.name: county_id
requestParams.desc: 行政区划代码。参考高德城市编码表 http://lbs.amap.com/api/webservice/download

requestParams.name: is_optional_self_fetch_time
requestParams.desc: 是否需要买家选择自提时间。1表示需要，0表示不需要

requestParams.name: is_self_fetch
requestParams.desc: 是否是自提点。1表示是，0表示否

requestParams.name: is_store
requestParams.desc: 是否是门店。1表示是，0表示否

requestParams.name: local_delivery_polygon
requestParams.desc: 同城配送范围多边形,只有当local_delivery_scope_type=2时生效。格式如：点1经度,点1纬度|点2经度,点2纬度|点3经度，点3纬度|点4经度，点4纬度...（百度坐标系）

requestParams.name: local_delivery_scope_type
requestParams.desc: 同城配送范围划分方式：1半径 2多边形

requestParams.name: support_local_delivery
requestParams.desc: 是否支持本地配送。1表示支持，0表示不支持

requestParams.name: tag_ids
requestParams.desc: 标签id列表，逗号分隔。需要先创建网点分组

responseParams.name: id
responseParams.desc: 成功时返回新增的网点id

struct.name: id
struct.desc: 成功时返回新增的网点id
